code:
```verilog
[BEGIN]
module TopModule(
    input logic in1,  // 1-bit input
    input logic in2,  // 1-bit input
    input logic in3,  // 1-bit input
    output logic out  // 1-bit output
);

    // Combinational logic to compute the output
    always @(*) begin
        out = (1'b1 ^ (in1 ^ in2)) ^ in3;  // Corrected logic implementation
    end

endmodule
[DONE]
```

issues: Numeric constants should have explicit size (e.g., 1'b0 not 0)

iterations.code:
```verilog
module TopModule(
    input logic in1,  // 1-bit input
    input logic in2,  // 1-bit input
    input logic in3,  // 1-bit input
    output logic out  // 1-bit output
);

    // Combinational logic to compute the output
    always @(*) begin
        out = (~(in1 ^ in2)) ^ in3;  // Corrected logic implementation
    end

endmodule
```
